00022 template <class Base>
00023 class TLoggerCompWrap: public ibase::TLoggerWrap<Base>
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef ibase::TLoggerWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00027 
00028        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TLoggerCompWrap);
00029               I_ASSIGN(m_logCompPtr, "Log", "Consumer log messages", false, "Log");
00030               I_ASSIGN(m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr, "EnableVerbose", "If enabled, verbose messages can be produced", true, false);
00031        I_END_COMPONENT;
00032 
00033 protected:
00037        bool IsVerboseEnabled() const;
00038 
00042        void SendVerboseMessage(const QString& message, const QString& messageSource = QString()) const;
00043 
00044        // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00045        virtual void DecorateMessage(
00046                             istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
00047                             int id,
00048                             int flags,
00049                             QString& message,
00050                             QString& messageSource) const;
00051 
00052        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00053        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00054 
00055 private:
00056        I_REF(ibase::IMessageConsumer, m_logCompPtr);
00057        I_ATTR(bool, m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr);
00058 };
00059 
00060 
00061 // protected methods
00062        
00063 template <class Base>
00064 bool TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::IsVerboseEnabled() const
00065 {
00066        return *m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr;
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 template <class Base>
00071 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::SendVerboseMessage(const QString& message, const QString& messageSource) const
00072 {
00073        if (*m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr){
00074               BaseClass::SendInfoMessage(0, message, messageSource);
00075        }
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00080 
00081 template <class Base>
00082 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::DecorateMessage(
00083                      istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
00084                      int id,
00085                      int flags,
00086                      QString& message,
00087                      QString& messageSource) const
00088 {
00089        BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, message, messageSource);
00090 
00091        const icomp::CComponentContext* contextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(BaseClass::GetComponentContext());
00092        if (contextPtr != NULL){
00093               if (messageSource.isEmpty()){
00094                      messageSource = contextPtr->GetContextId();
00095               }
00096               else{
00097                      messageSource = QString(contextPtr->GetContextId()) + " (" + messageSource + ")";
00098               }
00099        }
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00104 
00105 template <class Base>
00106 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::OnComponentCreated()
00107 {
00108        if (m_logCompPtr.IsValid()){
00109               this->SetLogPtr(m_logCompPtr.GetPtr());
00110        }
00111 
00112        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00113 }
